titles.title: Explosive Ordnance Disposal Brain Health and Suicide Report Act of 2024
Explosive Ordnance Disposal Brain Health and Suicide Report Act of 2024

To direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress a report on the correlation between service in the Armed Forces conducting explosive ordnance disposal and post-traumatic stress disorder, traumatic brain injury, and suicide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Explosive Ordnance Disposal Brain Health and Suicide Report Act of 2024
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on the effects of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), traumatic brain injury, and death by suicide specific to explosive ordnance disposal personnel.
